overview: Filmed Live during Spring Break 1986 at the World Famous Candy Store in Ft. Lauderdale Florida. Features: Wet T-Shirt Contest Wet Nightie Contest - Teenie Weenie Bikini - It's the closest thing to being there! Every year during spring vacation, there is an annual trek of over 350,00 college kids to the beaches of Ft. Lauderdale Florida.
tagline: It's the closest thing to being there!
title: The Girls of Spring Break '86
